message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go down to $8000 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8500. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $8200?
Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go down to $8200, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $8400. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I would like to stick closer to my budget. Could you consider offering the product at $8300?
